page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content: Aberaeron is the largest settlement in the area(The Domesday Block).The estimated population in 1976 was 1500. The 1981 census showed only 1444 people. In 1981 there was a{significantly {larger number of females than males, and there were almost twice as many women as men over the age of 60. The small number of males in the 20-60 age group probably{reflects the {lack of job opportunities locally.} In comparison with the rest of Ceredigion it had a lower proportion of people in the 15-44 age groups and more retired people.{17.7%}of the population are under 16 but{25%}are over 65.This reflects the national trend of an ageing population. {Providing services for our old people {is a growing problem. Keeping young {people in the area is also difficult.
